short_summary: Digital scanning services, indexing and delivery
duration_in_months: You will need to bid over the whole duration
full_summary:
#REFRESH #1 - REQUEST FOR STANDING OFFER FOR DIGITAL SCANNING SERVICES

## INTRODUCTION
On **2024-05-06**, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a **Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)** to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for digital scanning services, including scanning, indexing, and delivery of electronic documents. The procurement number for this RFSO is **WS3991178614-Doc4572231584**.

## PROCUREMENT DETAILS 

* **Procurement Method**: The request was tendered as a **Competitive - Open bidding** process.
* **Procurement Category**: The category of the RFSO is **SRV** (Services).
* **Notice Type**: This procurement falls under **Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**.


## CONTRACT DETAILS 

* **Closes on**: The closing date of this RFSO is on **2024-07-04** at **14:00:00**.
* **Contract type**: This contract will be a **Standing Offer** for a period of two years, starting from the expected contract start date (yet to be determined), up to **2026-11-29**.
* **Expected contract value**: The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.
* **Trade Agreements**: This contract is subject to various trade agreements including **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**, **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**, and many more.


## CONTRACT TEAM

The point of contact for this RFSO is:
Ryan Grant
ryan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
The contracting entity is **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** located at **11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada** ([www.pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca/en/contracting](http://www.pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca/en/contracting)).



## ADDITIONAL DETAILS
All interested vendors must submit their proposals in accordance with the **"Buyandsell"** directory's `-Preference System-Sourcing**` guide and also in accordance with any additional instructions posted on Ariba Discovery (ID: #19608432).
